law.catch_line: Except in a proceeding by the State or any of its political subdivisions, the acceptance of a certif...
law.text:
Except in a proceeding by the State or any of its political subdivisions, the acceptance of a certificate of reinstatement for record by the Department is conclusive evidence of:
The payment of all fees, taxes, unemployment insurance contributions, and reimbursement payments required to be paid;
The filing of all reports required to be filed; and
The reinstatement of the right of the statutory trust to do business in the State.
